children.text: You can enhance the user experience by structuring your data into sections. Each section includes a title, a brief description, and related inputs or data.

options.label: Restrict the available users to the list below.

children.text: Assigned users must match both the selected groups and roles in the specified memberships. If only a group or only a role is selected, the user must belong to that group or role accordingly.
Users listed below can still be involved, regardless of the groups or roles selected above
Notify users assigned to the task that it is now available

In each step, multiple buttons can be configured (e.g., Validate, Submit, Reject, Close procedure). Each button is linked to a predefined Boolean variable specific to the step. By default, all these variables are false.
When a user clicks a button, the corresponding variable is set to true. This state can then be used to trigger conditional actions, such as redirection, notifications, or field updates.

children.label: Save without completing (Preserve current data and return later. This step will remain open)
Submit and complete (Submit your data and mark this step as done)
Submit and approve (Submit the request and validate it as approved.)
Manager of the user who handled a specific step

children.text: Assigned users must match both the selected groups and roles in the specified memberships. If only a group or only a role is selected, the user must belong to that group or role accordingly.

children.text: Time allowed to complete the task
